Desc.entry: Runs social and sporting activities. Also runs childrens clubs. Kitchen facilities. Rooms available for hire (see separate entry). Has a Festival day in June, Christmas Fayre in November and Pantomime in December.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Jeanette Turner, Chair/Mrs M Hall, Treasurer

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 12noon-2pm (over 50s group), Tues 6-7.30pm (younger children's club), 6-9pm (older children's club), Wed 11am-2pm (womens craft group), Thurs 11am-12noon (Agewell club over 60s group), Fri pm (toddler group), Fri & Sun (karate club), Sun 9.30am-2pm (Church group all ages)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 5
